title: Padre Island National Seashore: Learn About the Park
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park           Learn About the Park         Railroad vines on the beach at Padre Island National Seashore. NPS  Sea Turtles Discover the 5 sea turtle species found here and find out how you might see one. News  Keep informed about park news and events.  Photos & Multimedia Browse photos and videos of Padre Island.  History & Culture  Find out about the people who have visited and used this land over the last thousand years. Nature  Learn about the island's plant and animal life, ecosystems, and other natural features.  Education  Bring your students to the beach or bring the beach to your classroom.  Kids &Youth  Find activities for kids and youth to do at home and during your visit to Padre Island.  Management Learn more about our staff, laws and policies, fire management, and your dollars at work.  Bookstore The bookstore at the Malaquite Visitor Center carries a variety of books and other merchandise.
